content:
I also had a parking ticket on March 28th that I need to add to the spreadsheet. It was $40.
assistant:Here's the updated spreadsheet:

| Date | Category | Description | Amount |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 2/22 | Maintenance | Flat tire repair | $15.00 |
| 3/18 | Maintenance | Oil change | $35.00 |
| 3/18 | Maintenance | Tire rotation and balancing | $20.00 |
| 4/1 | Maintenance | Car detailing | $120.00 |
| 3/28 | Parking/Tolls | Parking ticket | $40.00 |

I added a new category for Parking/Tolls, but you can adjust the category name if you prefer something else.

Now that we've got most of your expenses added, do you want to start tracking your fuel expenses as well? You mentioned filling up your gas tank on March 11th, April 3rd,
